item.title: SNAP
item.description: score:-35 Chances: Snap’s focus on growing domestic user numbers is a positive sign for potential future revenue growth. Snap’s ability to capitalize on the visual messaging trend and its AR technology could provide a competitive edge in the market. The company’s IP purchase from the fit technology company shows its commitment to innovation and technological advancement.
